original_text: “Listen carefully to what I am about to tell you: The Son of Man is going to be delivered into the hands of men.”
korean_text: 이 말을 너희 귀에 담아 두라 인자가 장차 사람들의 손에 넘겨지리라 하시되

sentences.original_text: Listen carefully to what I am about to tell you:
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너희에게 말하려는 것을 주의 깊게 들으라:

sentences.original_text: The Son of Man is going to be delivered
